00039 class Champ_front_xyz_debit : public Champ_front_normal
00040 {
00041   Declare_instanciable(Champ_front_xyz_debit);
00042 
00043 protected:
00044   Champ_front velocity_profil_;
00045   Champ_front flow_rate_;
00046 // in TRUST the normal vector to a surface is stocked weighted by the area of the surface via "face_normales"
00047 // here we want normal vectors only, formely known as normales_divisees_par_aire_
00048 // We need the normal vector (only) because the velocity field will be perpendicular the surface
00049   DoubleTab normal_vectors_;
00050   DoubleTab coeff_;
00051   DoubleTab integrale_;

00058
